shortdesc.ph: Reports the statistics of the video stream sent by each remote user during a call.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, RemoteVideoStats stats)? onRemoteVideoStats;
public virtual void OnRemoteVideoStats(RtcConnection connection, RemoteVideoStats stats) {}

section.p: This callback reports end-to-end video stream statistics of remote users during a call. It is triggered every 2 seconds for each remote user/host. If there are multiple remote users/hosts, this callback is triggered multiple times every 2 seconds.
